mapper.sql: a.building_no as buildingNo,a.building_name as buildingName, t.CUSTOMER_ID as customerId,t.BUILDING_ID as buildingId,t.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, t.FLOOR_NUMBER as floorNumber, t.ROOM_NUMBER as roomNumber, t.CUSTOMER_TYPE as customerType, t.CUSTOMER_INDUSTRY as customerIndustry, t.COMPETITOR_NAME as competitorName, t.COMPETITOR_TYPE as competitorType, t.COMPETITOR_END as competitorEnd, t.KEY_PERSON as keyPerson, t.KEY_PERSON_CONTACT as keyPersonContact, t.REMARK as remark, t.DELETE_FLAG as deleteFlag, t.CREATE_STAFF_ID as createStaffId, t.CREATE_DATE as createDate, t.MODIFY_STAFF_ID as modifyStaffId, t.MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate, t.MODIFY_OP as modifyOp
mapper.select:
select
from BD_CUSTOMER_OPPORTUNITY t join bd_building a on t.building_id = a.building_id where t.delete_flag = 0 and a.delete_flag = 0
and a.CREATE_STAFF_ID = #{createStaffId}
AND t.building_id = (select A.building_id from bd_building A where A.building_no like '%'||#{buildingNo}||'%')
AND t.building_id = (select A.building_id from bd_building A where A.building_name like '%'||#{buildingName}||'%')
AND t.customer_name like '%'||#{customerName}||'%'
order by t.CUSTOMER_ID desc
mapper.insert:
select seq_bd_customer_opportunity.nextval as customerId from dual
insert into BD_CUSTOMER_OPPORTUNITY values (#{customerId},#{buildingId},#{customerName},#{floorNumber},#{roomNumber},#{customerType},#{customerIndustry},#{competitorName}, #{competitorType},#{competitorEnd},#{keyPerson},#{keyPersonContact},#{remark},#{deleteFlag},#{createStaffId},#{createDate}, #{modifyStaffId},#{modifyDate},#{modifyOp})
mapper.select:
select
from BD_CUSTOMER_OPPORTUNITY t join bd_building a on t.building_id = a.building_id where t.delete_flag = 0 and a.delete_flag = 0 and t.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} order by t.CUSTOMER_ID
mapper.update: update BD_CUSTOMER_OPPORTUNITY t set t.building_id = #{buildingId}, t.CUSTOMER_NAME=#{customerName},t.FLOOR_NUMBER = #{floorNumber},t.ROOM_NUMBER=#{roomNumber},t.CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{customerType}, t.CUSTOMER_INDUSTRY=#{customerIndustry},t.COMPETITOR_NAME = #{competitorName},t.COMPETITOR_TYPE=#{competitorType},t.COMPETITOR_END = #{competitorEnd}, t.KEY_PERSON=#{keyPerson},t.KEY_PERSON_CONTACT = #{keyPersonContact},t.REMARK=#{remark},t.MODIFY_STAFF_ID = #{modifyStaffId},t.MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate} where t.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} and t.delete_flag = 0
